Class Article¶

class src.entities.base.Article.Article(cod, art_name, cost, list_price)[source]¶

Article class This class is responsible of modeling the articles of sale.

__init__(cod, art_name, cost, list_price)[source]¶

Init method Initializes an instance of Article class given the following parameters

Parameters:
  • cod – code for generate ean13
  • art_name – article name
  • cost – article factory cost
  • list_price – article sale cost
